title: How to Make Banana Soup

steps.headline: Let the butter melt in a pan, but don't allow the butter to color.
Add the flour and stir smoothly.
Add the peeled tomatoes and the peeled bananas in slices with the roux.
steps.description: Stir well and let it heat for 1 minute.

steps.headline: Add 2 liters (0.5 US gal)(~2 quarts) of water.
Close the pan of and let the soup cook softly for about 10 minutes.
Add the beef bouillon and season it.
Add before serving the soup the cream and chopped parsley.

text: Let the butter melt in a pan, but don't allow the butter to color.  Add the flour and stir smoothly.  Add the peeled tomatoes and the peeled bananas in slices with the roux. Stir well and let it heat for 1 minute. Add 2 liters (0.5 US gal)(~2 quarts) of water.  Close the pan of and let the soup cook softly for about 10 minutes.  Add the beef bouillon and season it.  Mix the soup.  Add before serving the soup the cream and chopped parsley.  Finished.
